title: Create a Project Glossary
description: An agent must scan a collection of project documents and create a glossary of key terms and acronyms.

tasks.description: Process all documents in a specified project folder.
Identify all acronyms and technical terms used in the documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a list of potential glossary terms.

tasks.description: For each term, find its definition or first usage context within the documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a definition or context for each term.

tasks.description: Format the findings into a two-column glossary table (Term | Definition).
